meanings.definition: The understanding of a situation or event only after it has happened.
meanings.sent1: In hindsights, I realized I should have studied more for the test.
meanings.sent2: She only had hindsights about the mistake she made after the project was completed.
meanings.sent3: With hindsights, I now see the humor in my failed attempt at baking a cake.
meanings.sent4: Hindsights hit me like a ton of bricks when I saw the final score.
meanings.sent5: The pain of hindsights lingered long after the event had passed.

meanings.definition: The ability to understand, after something has happened, what should have been done or what caused the event.
meanings.sent1: His hindsights led him to realize he should have listened to his friend's advice.
meanings.sent2: Hindsights can be a valuable tool for learning from past mistakes.
meanings.sent3: With hindsights, she saw the irony in her decision to wear flip-flops in the snow.
meanings.sent4: The weight of hindsights pressed down on him as he reflected on the missed opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of hindsights illuminated the path forward after the error was made.
